pages.text: 91|1|Sapatha suryera ebam tara kiranera [1]
91|2|sapatha camdera, yakhana ta suryera para abirbhuta haya [1]
91|3|sapatha dinera, yakhana se suryake prakasa kare [1]
91|4|sapatha ratera, yakhana se suryake acchadita kare [1]
91|5|sapatha asamanera ebam yini ta nirmana karechena tamra [1]
91|6|sapatha jaminera ebam yini ta bistrta karechena tamra [1]
91|7|sapatha naphsera [1] ebam yini ta subin'yasta karechena tamra [2]
91|8|tarapara take tara satkajera ebam tara asat-kajera jnana dana karechena [1] –
91|9|se-i saphalakama hayeche, ye nijeke pabitra kareche.
91|10|Ara se-i byartha hayeche, ye nijeke kalusita kareche [1].
91|11|Samuda sampradaya abadhyatabasata [1] mithyaropa karechila.
91|12|Tadera madhye ye sarbadhika hatabhagya, se yakhana tatpara haye uthala
91|13|takhana allahara rasula taderake balalena, ‘allahara ustri o take pani pana karanora bisaye sabadhana ha'o [1].’
91|14|Kintu tara tara prati mithyaropa karala ebam ustrike jaba'i karala [1]. Phale tadera papera jan'ya tadera raba taderake samule dhbansa kare ekakara kare dilena [2].
91|15|Ara tini era parinamake bhaya karena na [1].
92|1|Sapatha ratera, yakhana se acchanna kare
92|2|sapatha dinera, yakhana ta udbhasita haya
92|3|sapatha tamra, yini nara o nari srsti karechena
92|4|Niscaya tomadera karmapracesta bibhinna prakrtira [1].
92|5|Kaje'i [1] ke'u dana karale, taka'oya abalambana karale
92|6|ebam ya uttama ta satya bale grahana karale
92|7|amara tara jan'ya sugama kare deba sahaja patha [1].
92|8|Ara [1] ke'u karpanya karale ebam nijake amukhapeksi mane karale
92|9|ara ya uttama tate mithyaropa karale
92|10|tara jan'ya amara sugama kare deba kathora patha [1].
92|11|Ara tara sampada tara kono kaje asabe na, yakhana se dhbansa habe [1].
92|12|Niscaya amadera kaja sudhu pathanirdesa kara [1]
92|13|ara amara'i to malika akheratera o prathamatira (duniyara) [1].
92|14|Atahpara ami tomaderake lelihana aguna [1] samparke satarka kare diyechi.
